title: Darius AP, AD Zilean and AP Jungle Lucian.  WHY WE NEED A DODGE BUTTON!
body:
How many of us have been in champ select and thought "...there is no AP on my team... Riot, why did you make Zed an AD Mid?!?" OR "...Mundo and Sion duoing top... so, we don't need a jungler?" OR "BESTFIORANA hasn't called anything yet and the only position available is support... you have 5 seconds... o.k. so you've locked Fiora and called for top..." OR "I don't care what you say, if you want to go ADC Urgot, don't get Rylai's Crystal Scepter and Liandry's Torment!" OR "... so my support is Gangplank... " OR " ...so, my support is Master Yi..." OR "... so my support is Kalista... " OR " ...so, my support is Kassadin..." or "... so my support is Teemo-FUCK YOU!!!"... OR "... so my support is Yasuo, because Annie wants mid" OR " ... so my support is Mother Jenson from the orphanage I grew up in, BECAUSE SHE IS FEEDING EVERYONE BUT ME!"?

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE give us a dodge button. It isn't fair to kick us off for 5 mins because we can see that the guy that got "Clarity" on Tryndamere probably wont take the game seriously. 

I have been in far too many bad games. PLEASE don't put me through another year of this.

(I would have written a letter to someone, but I didn't know where to send the letter).

replies.body:
>raging about people breaking the meta

This is not the place for that. This isn't even a place for feature suggestions.

If you're that inclined to talk to a red about it, though, send an e-mail to support@riotgames.com
